name: Grischa - DAS Hotel Davos

reviews.text: I don't think I have ever raved about a hotel to friends quite so much as the Grischa in Davos. I have stayed in many Swiss ski resort hotels in the same price bracket and this is far better than anywhere else.
reviews.title: Great find! Will be back

reviews.title: We know what it takes to be a good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is great. Opposite the train station for getting to Parsenn ski region. Near the cable for the Jacobshorn. Excellent restaurants in the hotel and nearby. Ski shop (very helpful and friendly) almost opposite and storage room on site at the hotel or at the ski shop. You can buy your lift passes from reception - which saves a lot of time and they take credit cards which the ski lift office did not. No spa but has a sauna.
reviews.title: Fabulous hotel, excellent location for Jacobshorn and train, very friendly staff.

description: Just as unique as Davos - Hotel Grischa.The Dutch proprietor family realized a unique concept in December of 2011. Ninety-three hotel rooms and suites as well as the culinary versatility offering 5 different restaurants, completely do justice to the requirements of a luxurious design & lifestyle hotel – open year-round!
